pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:0.5: 10. The training rule on dancing and singing
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.2: At that time in Rājagaha there was a hilltop festival,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.3: and the nuns from the group of six went to see it.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.5: “How can nuns go to see dancing, singing, and music? They are just like householders who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.6: The nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.7: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.8: “How can the nuns from the group of six go to see dancing, singing, and music?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.9: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did that?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.12: “How can the nuns from the group of six go to see dancing, singing, and music?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.13: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.14: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.15: ‘If a nun goes to see dancing or singing or music, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.11: If she is on her way to see it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.12: Wherever she stands to see it or hear it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.13: Every time she moves outside the range of sight and then sees it or hears it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.14: If she is on her way to see one of the three, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.15: Wherever she stands to see it or hear it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.16: Every time she moves outside the range of sight and then sees it or hears it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.2: if she sees it or hears it while standing in the monastery;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.3: if the dancing, singing, or music comes to the place where the nun is standing, sitting, or lying down;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.4: if she sees it or hears it while walking in the opposite direction;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.5: if she goes there because there is something to be done and she then sees it or hears it;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.8: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.9: The tenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.10: The first chapter on garlic is finished.
